title: F.Developers
author: F.Developers
content: Hello, i will create a panel for you that would enable you sell to users who want to own unlimited virtual cards in their name and address. This system would enable you sell unlimited cards and you would make money from the card generation and loading.Here are the features of the panel you would be receiving.1) I would install a B2B2C billing panel for you so that your users too are able to resell your service, this is possible so that your customers are also able to own a panel like yours while they just modify your prices and make profit each time someone buys from their reseller website, you as the Super Admin you would be able to control the whole system and make withdrawals for your resellers who have earned. (Optional features)2) Unlimited Master Virtual Card, your system would connect to an API that would create the cards, all this is what i would set up for you. Your customers are able to create Unlimited cards without issue and on whatever name and address (US).3) Loaded With Bitcoin: Your customers can decide to select which payment method as set by you on your panel, but for you, you would need to fund Via Bitcoin or USDT. The loading fee is just about 5%. You can set whatever fee for your own customers.4) API Features: Your customers or resellers would be able to connect via an API system to buy virtual cards from your websiteAnd many more features;To get this panel, it will cost only $500. If you want a custom billing panel, then send me a PM we shall discuss the cost for this. Telegram: @FATechnologiesRegards.
